issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has not yet been validated, and is not currently being investigated.
status.name: Unconfirmed

fields.description:
Opening to note behavior seen after power cycling the larger scale system cloud in house. 

The remote services were stuck in a state logging these messages endlessly over the course of several days without recovering:
{code}
INFO | Waiting for system view with database.
{code}

Verified that unicast and multi-cast traffic was being seen on the remote machines from the CLC during this period. 
Restarting all the remote cloud services (ie not the CLC) repaired the condition. 

QA will be performing power cycle and reboot testing to attempt to reproduce this issue. 
Thanks
-M

Service states:
{code}

fields.summary: Remote Cloud Services do not rejoin cloud post reboot/power cycle

comments.body: [~mclark], please update with QA reboot testing results.
If the hosts have multiple interfaces then we should ensure the bind-addr is configured in eucalyptus.conf CLOUD_OPTS.
